summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 DAEWOO LANOS.  BY RESEARCHING THE NHTSA WEBSITE, THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT HIS VEHICLE WAS INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 04V357000 (ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING).  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A LOCAL DEALER AND THEY STATED THAT THEY WOULD NOT REPAIR THE FAILURE UNDER THE RECALL; THEREFORE, THE CONTACT WOULD BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE $400 REPAIR COST.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED AND HE HAS BEEN UNABLE TO REACH THE MANUFACTURER.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 64,000 AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 68,000.

2000 LANOS CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED.  *TS  THE VEHICLE RAN FINE.  SEVERAL MONTHS LATER THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FROM DAEWOO 5/1/2006.  THE RECALL WAS FOR THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THE CONSUMER CALLED THE NUMBER PROVIDED BUT KEPT BEING CONNECTED TO THE MESSAGE SERVICE.  THE CONSUMER HAS LEFT SEVERAL  MESSAGES BUT HAS NEVER RECEIVED A RESPONSE.  *NM

CONSUMER REQUESTING REIMBURSEMENT FOR RECALL REPAIRS MADE ON A 2000 DAEWOO LANOS *KB  THE CONSUMER HAS THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR REPLACE PRIOR TO RECALL NOTIFICATION. THE CONSUMER HAS ATTEMPTED TO CONTACT DAEWOO BUT KEEPS GETTING THE VOICEMAIL.  *NM

WHILE DRIVING 65 MPH IN OVERDRIVE THE VEHICLE DROPPED DOWN TO SECOND OR THIRD GEAR WITHOUT WARNING. THE CAUSE HAS YET TO BE DETERMINED. PLEASE PROVIDE ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.   *NM  THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN IN THE SHOP THEY CANNOT FIND THE PROBLEM.  IT IS UNSAFE DRIVING AT 65 MPH AND CAR DROP DOWN IN GEAR.  THE ENGINE GET HIGH RPM THIS COULD MAKE THE ENGINE BLOW UP AND LOSE CONTROL OF THE CAR.   *BF
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR. DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.  *AK   *BF  *NM
VEHICLE STALLS WHEN STARTING THE ENGINE. THE CAUSE IS UNDETERMINED.*AK

CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 02V131000 CONCERNING PASSENGER AIR BAG ASSEMBLY MODIFICATION ON SEPTEMBER 27, 2004. CONSUMER  CONTACTED THE DEAERSHIP ON FOUR OCCASIONS. HOWEVER, CONSUMER WAS CONSTANTLY TOLD THAT THE  PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE.  *AK

RECALL 02V131001 CONCERNING AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT. CONSUMER  TOOK  VEHICLE TO DEALER  FOR  RECALL REPAIRS, AND INFORMED THE DEALER THAT THE AIR BAG LIGHT CONTINUED TO ILLUMINATE. THE SERVICE TECHNICIAN DETERMINED THAT THE ILLUMINATION OF THE AIR BAG LIGHT HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH THE RECALL. CONSUMER WAS DEVASTATED. *AK  *TC
CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO HAVE THE VEHICLE REPAIRED FOR  THE CAM SHAFT SENSOR, AND  AIR BAG NHTSA RECALLS  04V357000 AND 02V131000.  *AK
THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR MALFUNCTIONED. A RECALL WAS ISSUED, HOWEVER THE VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER WAS OUTSIDE OF THE REMEDY SCOPE. PLEASE PROVIDE ADDITIONAL INFORMATION. *JB
CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 04V357000  CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.   DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK   *TC

THE CONSUMER RECEIVED NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 ON THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.   CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL.   THIS INFORMATION WAS PROVIDE BY MARISELA'S SON-IN-LAW OMAR GUEVARA.   *JB   THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT WAS ON.  THE VEHICLE HAD STOPPED WHILE IN MOTION.  THE CONSUMER WAS INFORMED THAT THE PROBLEM WAS A BAD CAM POSITION OR RELATED TO THE TIMING BELT POSSIBLY BEING TORN AND THE VALVES MAY HAD GOTTEN DAMAGED.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT REAPPEARED.   *SC

CONSUMER WAS DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY AND VEHICLE PARKED FACING THE ONCOMING  TRAFFIC. VEHICLE TURNED ON ITS HEADLIGHTS, CAUSING THE DRIVER TO SWERVE.  THE VEHICLE TURNED OVER AND EJECTED THE DRIVER. UPON IMPACT AIRBAGS FAILED TO DEPLOY. CURRENTLY, THE VEHICLE IS BEING RECALLED BY THE MANUFACTURER FOR DEFECTIVE AIRBAGS.*AK  CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER : 02V131001.   *TC

THE CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE TO SERVICE TIRE AND AUTO DEALERSHIP FOR THE DAEWOO RECALL.  SHE RECEIVED A BILL BECAUSE  DAEWOO WAS NOT PAYING FOR  RECALL REPAIRS.  SOMEONE AT DOT TOLD CONSUMER BY TELEPHONE THAT DAEWOO WAS IN  CHAPTER 11 BANKRUPTCY,  AND THEY MAY NOT GET PAID.  THE CONSUMER STATED THAT SHE COULD NOT AFFORD TO PAY THIS BILL.  THE CURRENTLY, SHE  RECEIVED ANOTHER RECALL  NOTICE FROM DAEWOO, BUT DID NOT KNOW WHAT TO DO.  THE DEALER THAT CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE TO WAS SERVICE TIRE AND AUTO, IN LAKE CHARLES, LA.  337-855 9397.  THE MECHANIC'S NAME WAS DAVID.   *AK   RECALL# 04V357000.   *SC

THE CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR, AND RECALL 02V131001 REGARDING AIR BAGS.  THE CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE TO THE DEALERSHIP, AND MECHANIC CLAIMED THE NUMBER ON PARTS DID NOT MATCH THE PARTS NEEDED TO REPAIR THE VEHICLE, AND THE CONSUMER HAD TO PAY FOR PARTS BEFORE ORDERING.   *AK   SMOKE AND FUMES HAD COME FROM THE HOSE AND THE CONSUMER STATED THAT COOLANT LEAKED.   *SC
NHTSA RECALL 02V131001  CONCERNING FMVSS 201/ AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT.  CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL.   *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSTION SENSOR. DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
NHTSA RECALL 02V131001  CONCERNING FMSSS 201 AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT.  NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE.  *AK  *TC
NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING  CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR. VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER, AND THE MECHANIC REFUSED TO HONOR THE RECALL BECAUSE THE SENSOR WAS NOT AFFECTED BY THE RECALL.   *AK
NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE.*AK  *TC

RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THE CONSUMER HAD TAKEN THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER TO HAVE THE DEFECT REPAIRED.  THE SERVICE TECHNICIAN TOLD THE CONSUMER THAT THEY WOULD INSPECT THE VEHICLE, BUT IT WAS NOT RECALLED. THUS, REFUSING TO REPAIR IT.   *AK   *SC

NHTSA RECALL: 04V357000 SUBJECT: CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.   THE MECHANIC REPLACED THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  HOWEVER, TWO WEEKS LATER THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT APPEARED ON THE DASHBOARD AND THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK TO THE DEALER FOR INSPECTION.   THE MECHANIC DETERMINED THAT A NEW CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR WAS NEEDED.   *JB   THE ENGINE LIGHT REMAINED ON EVEN AFTER ALL REPAIRS WERE MADE.   *SC
NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.   CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO  HONOR THE RECALL.*AK
THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICED(0V4357000)  FOR THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THERE WAS NO DEALER IN THE AREA TO PERFORM THE RECALL. *JB
THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE (02V257001) REGARDING THE BRAKE HOSE. THERE WAS NO DEALER AVAILABLE TO PERFORM THE RECALL. *JB
CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE(0V4357000) FOR THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THERE WAS NO DEALER AVAILABLE TO PERFORM THE RECALL.*JB
NHTSA RECALL 02V131001 CONCERNING FMVSS 201 AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT.NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE.  *AK  *TC
NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE.  *AK   *NM
CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 0V4357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR. DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.  *AK
CONSUMER  RECEIVED RECALL 02V257001 CONCERNING BRAKE HOSE. DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK

CONSUMER RECEIVED NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR  RECALL REPAIRS AND THE DEALER REFUSED TO HONOR THE RECALL.  MECHANIC INFORMED THE CONSUMER THAT THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR WAS NOT DEFECTED.  *AK. RECALL STATES ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON, AND THERE IS A METAL BURNING SMELL. ENGINE LIGHT REPORTED TO ROSEN NISSAN ON FEBRUARY 19, 2004, MILEAGE 34,861 *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 02V257001 CONCERNING  BRAKE HOSE.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK

RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT SENSOR. CONSUMER RECEIVED THIS RECALL NOTICE AND WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A AUTHORIZED SERVICE CENTER IN HER AREA.*AK.........DAEWOOD DEALER IN HOUSTON CLAIMED THIS VEHICLE WA SNOT COVERED UNDER THE RECALL AND REFUSED TO SERVICE IT.  *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  NHTSA RECALL 04V350000 CONCERNING  CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.   HOWEVER, CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL.   *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 02V257001 CONCERNING  BRAKE HOSE.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.  *AK

MULTIPLE RECALL NOTICES CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENOR ON 2000 DAEWOO LANOS.     *BF  THE CONSUMER ATTEMPTED TO CONTACTED THE DEALERSHIP TO SET UP AN APPOINTMENT HE WAS UNABLE TO REACH ANYONE BY THE PHONE NUMBER THAT WAS PROVIDED IN THE RECALL LETTER.  THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD BY LOCAL DEALERSHIPS THAT THERE WERE NO DAEWOO DEALERSHIPS IN EXISTENCE AND THEY WERE NOT AWARE OF ANY DEALERSHIP THAT WERE WILLING TO FIX THE VEHICLE.    (CONSUMER DID NOT STATE WHICH RECALL). *JB
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 02V257001 CONCERNING  BRAKE HOSE.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE(0V4357000) FOR THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THE DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION. *JB
THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE(02V257001) FOR THE BRAKE HOSE. THE DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION. *JB

THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT APPEAR ON THE DASHBOARD AND REMAIN ON.   CONSUMER RECEIVED NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 ON THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER FOR THE RECALL AND THE DEALER CHARGE THE CONSUMER $81.33 FOR THE RECALL.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER DETAILS.  *JB

A RECALL (04V357000) FOR THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR. THE CONSUMER STATES THAT THE DEALER REFUSED TO REPAIR THE VEHICLE BECAUSE THE PART NUMBER  WAS OUTSIDE OF THE RECALL SCOPE, HOWEVER, THE VIN NUMBER APPLIED. PLEASE PROVIDE ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.  *JB  *TC
NHTSA  RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL.*AK  *TC
RECALL 04V357000 ISSUED FOR CAMSHAFT POSITION SENOR ON DAEWOO.   *BF  THE CONSUMER STATED HE SPENT MONEY TO HAVE THE PROBLEM FIXED BUT THE PROBELM CONTINUED TO EXIST. *JB

RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENOR.  WIRING  MAY MELT RESULTING IN A BURNING SMELL AND/OR VISIBLE SMOKE AND POSSIBLY AN UNDERHOOD FIRE.  *BF   THE CONSUMER TOOK HER VEHICLE TO THE DEALER AND WAS TOLD HER VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.   THE CONSUMER STATED THE ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED.*JB

04V357000/CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR. THE CONSUMER RECEIVES A RECALL NOTICE FROM THE MANUFACTURER AND TOOK THE VEHICLE TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALERSHIP AND WAS CHARGED 130.50 FOR SERVICES RENDERED. PROVIDE FURTHER DETAILS. *JB
THE CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO HAVE THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR RECALL 04V357000 PERFORMED BECAUSE THERE WERE DEALERSHIPS IN THE AREA. *JB
NHTSA RECALL 04V35700 ON THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THE  CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL. *JB
THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE(0V4357000) FOR THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.   THE DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION. *JB
THE CONSUMER RECEIVED, NHTSA RECALL CAMPAIGN LETTER #04V357000 REGARDING THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THE COMPANY WAS OUT BUSINESS. NO DEALERSHIP AVAILABLE.  *JB
THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED. THE CAM SHAFT SENSOR WAS DEFECTIVE.  RECALL 04V357000.  *JB    CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO CONTACT A DAEWOO DEALER IN REGARDS TO THE RECALL.  PH
DEALERSHIP IS CHARGING THE CONSUMER TO PERFORM CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR  RECALL 04V357000 REPAIRS.  *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED TWO RECALLS, 02V131001 FOR  AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT, AND   0V4357000 FOR  CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  *AK
DEALERSHIP WAS UNABLE TO PERFORM AIR BAG RECALL 03V159000 BECAUSE THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE, AND THEY DIDN'T KNOW WHEN THEY WILL BECOME AVAILABLE.*AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICES CONCERNING  AIRBAG CAMPAIGN NUMBER 02V131000, AND CAM SHAFT CAMPAIGN NUMBER 04V357000.  THERE WAS NO DAEWOO DEALERSHIP IN HOLYOKE, MA.*AK
NHTSA RECALL 04V357000  CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  CONSUMER IS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL.*AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED NHTSA RECALL 02V131001 ON THE FMVSS 201/AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT.  CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL. *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL NOTICE 04V357000) FOR THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 02V131000 CONCERNING  AIR BAG FAILURE.   DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
NHTSA RECALL 04V357000  CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  NO PARTS AVAILABLE.  *AK
NHTSA RECALL 02V131001 ON THE FMVSS 201 AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT.  NO PARTS AVAILABLE.  *AK

CONSUMER  TOOK VEHICLE TO A DAEWOO DEALER, WHO TOLD HER THAT THEY DID NOT HAVE THE PARTS TO REPAIR THE RECALL.  ALSO, THEY TOLD HER THAT THEY DID NOT KNOW WHEN THEY WOULD BE GETTING THE PARTS.   NAME OF THE DEALER IS HALLADAY MOTOR, INC  2100 WESTLAND RD, CHEYENNE , WY. 82001  307 634 0894.*AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL NOTICE(04V357000  FOR THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 02V131000 CONCERNING AIR BAG FAILUR  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED ARECALL NOTICE  04V357000 FOR THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.  *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 02V131000 CONCERNING AIR BAG FAILURE.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
CONSUMER IS UNABLE TO HAVE  AIR BAG RECALL 02V131001, AND  CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR RECALL 04V357000 REPAIRS  PERFORMED BECAUSE THERE WERE  NO DEALERSHIPS IN THE STATE.*AK
DEALERSHIP CHARGED THE CONSUMER $249.89 TO PEFORM CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR RECALL 04V357000 REPAIRS. *AK
AFTER RECEIVING RECALL 04V357000 ON THE CAM SHAFT SENSOR THERE WERE NO DEALERS IN THE AREA TO MAKE THE REPAIRS.  *AK
CONSUMER IS UNABLE TO HAVE THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR RECALL 04V357000, AND AIR BAG  RECALL 02V131001 REPAIRS  PERFORMED BECAUSE THERE WEREN'T ANY DEALERSHIPS IN THE STATE.*AK

RECALLM 02V131001/FMVSS 201 AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT, AND 04 V04357 000 CONCERNING CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  CONSUMER RECEIVED TWO RECALL NOTICES,  AND WAS UNABLE TO GET THE DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL. DEALER REFUSE TO HONOR RECALL BECAUSE THE CONSUMER DID NOT PURCHASE THEIR VEHICLE FROM THEM. CONSUMER NEEDS TO PROVIDE THE DEALER INFORMATION.
NHTSA 04V357000 SUBJECT: CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.   CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL. *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED NHTSA RECALL 02V131001 CONCERNING FMVSS 201 AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT.  CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL.  *AK
NHTSA RECALL 02V131001 CONCERNING FMVSS 201 AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT.  CONSUMERR WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL.*AK

VEHICLE IS INOPERABLE.  THE CAM SHAFT SENSOR FAILED.   NO DEALER TO REPAIR  CAM SHAFT RECALL 04V357000.  *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL  02V131000 CONCERNING  AIR BAGS. PREEVIOUSLY, VEHICLE  BECAME INOPERABLE BECAUSE OF THE CAM SHAFT FAILURE.  *AK

CONSUMER  HAD SOMEONE REMOVING  BRAKE HOSE AND TAKING IT TO A DEALER TO GET ANOTHER ONE.   WHEN SHE GOT TO THE DEALER SHE WAS TOLD THAT THEY DO NOT SELL PARTS FOR DAEWOO ANYMORE, AND  THAT PARTS FOR DAEWOO  DO NOT EXIST. CONSUMER WANTED TO KNOW HOW CAN HER VEHICLE BE REPAIRED IF THEY DID NOT SELL THE PARTS FOR IT. NAME OF DEALER WAS  DAVID O'NEAL LOCATED IN RALEIGH, NC.  NOT SURE OF THE TELEPHONE NUMBER.*AK
RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR. CONSUMER STATED DEALER INFORMED HER THAT  VEHICLE DID NOT NEED  CAM SHAFT POSITION  SENSOR. CHECK ENGINE" LIGHT ILLUMINATED WHILE   DRIVING.*AK
RECALL (04V357000) WAS ISSUED FOR THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR. CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO FIND AN AUTHORIZED DEALER TO REPAIR THE VEHICLE. *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 0V4357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR. DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
CHECK ENGINE LIGHT IS ON.  CAM SHAFT POSITION  SENSOR IS ON RECALL, AND THERE ARE NO DEALERS IN THE AREA TO MAKE  REPAIRS.*AK
DEALERSHIP WAS UNABLE TO  PERFORM THE CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR RECALL 04V357000 REPAIRS  WITHIN A REASONABLE TIME FRAME.*AK
THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT COMES ON.  CAMSHAFT SENSOR   RECALL 04V357000.  *AK
NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE.*AK

CONSUMER TOOK  VEHICLE TO A DAEWOO DEALER AND THEY WERE NOT DOING DAEWOO RECALL REPAIRS. .  THE MECHANIC REFUSED TO WORK ON CONSUMER'S VEHICLE.  CONSUMER INFORMED MECHANIC THAT AIR BAG LIGHT WAS ON ONE AND A HALF WEEKS.  MECHANIC TOLD HER THAT THIS WAS DANGEROUS, BUT HE COULD NOT WORK ON IT. CONSUMER  WAS CONCERNED, AND  NEEDED  SOME PLACE TO TAKE VEHICLE FOR REPAIRS.   THE DAEWOO LISTED IN JONESBORO, GA WAS NOT THERE ANY MORE.*AK

TRANSMISSION WAS  REPLACED, THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON. CONSUMER  HAD TO PAY OUT OF POCKET, AND THE CAM SHAFT SENSOR WAS INSPECTED.   CAM SHAFT SENSOR RECALL 04V357000.  *AK

CONSUME RECEIVED RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.  *AK

CONSUMER  RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE.  TOOK VEHICLE TO STAR PONTIAC ON COUNTY RD, EASTON PA, TELEPHONE NUMBER  610 258 3800 FOR REPAIRS.   CONSUMER INSISTED THAT THE DEALER WAS ONLY SUPPOSE TO BE REPAIRING THE RECALLED PART.  CONSUMER PICKED UP THE VEHICLE,  BUT ONLY DROVE IT 1/2 MILE  IT BROKE DOWN. SHE CALLED THE DEALER.  HE CAME,  AND WITHOUT EXAMINING THE VEHICLE TOLD HER THAT THE TIMING BELT  BROKE.  CONSUMER SAID THIS COULD NOT BE TRUE BECAUSE SHE  HAD THE  TIMING BELT REPLACED IN JANUARY 2003.*AK  *TC
CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 04V357000 CONCRNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK
RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  CONSUMER RECEIVED THIS RECALL NOTICE AND WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE AN AUTHORIZED SERVICE CENTER IN THEIR AREAS.*AK

CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.  *AK

THE CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO FIND A DEALERSHIP OR CONTACT THE NUMBER PROVIDED ON THE RECALL LETTER FOR DAEWOO CUSTOMER SERVICE. RECALL#04V357000 CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR. PLEASE PROVIDE MORE INFORMATION.  *JB
THE CONSUMER RECEIVED, NHTSA RECALL CAMPAIGN LETTER #04V357000 REGARDING THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR. THE DEALERSHIP STILL DOES NOT HAVE THE PARTS AVAILABLE TO CONDUCT THE RECALL.  *JB
CONSUMER RECEIVED NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 ON THE CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  THE CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO LOCATE A DEALER TO HONOR THE RECALL.  *JB
CONSUMER RECEIVED NHTSA RECALL 04V357000 REGARDING  CRANK SHAFT POSITION SENSOR. VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALERSHIP. MECHANIC INDICATED TO THE CONSUMER  THERE WAS NOTHING WRONG WITH THE VEHICLE. *AK
AFTER RECEIVING RECALL CONSUMER SMELLED SOMETHING BURNING WHILE DRIVING.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON, AND SEVERAL MINUTES LATER THE ENGINE CAUGHT ON FIRE.  NHTSA RECALL 04V357000.  *AK
CONSUMER RECEIVED  RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  DEALER WAS NOT IN OPERATION.*AK

CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR FROM THE MANUFACTURER. CONSUMER  WENT TO AN AUTHORIZED DAEWOO DEALERSHIP IN UKIAH, CA AND WAS TOLD THAT THEY WERE NOT SERVICING ANY VEHICLES THAT THEY DID NOT SELL. CONSUMER WAS FURIES. *AK

CONSUMER EXPERIENCED PROBLEMS WITH  DAEWOO FOR OVER A YEAR, AND HAD BEEN TOLD THAT THERE WAS NOTHING WRONG WITH  VEHICLE. CHECK ENGINE LIGHT HAD BEEN ON SINCE LAST YEAR.  CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE TO THE DEALER A NUMBER OF TIMES, AND EACH TIME THEY TOLD CONSUMER THAT THE SENSOR LIGHT NEEDED TO BE TURNED OFF.  THEY TURNED THE SENSOR LIGHT OFF, AND IT STAYED OFF FOR A WHILE. THEN,  CAME RIGHT BACK ON. CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR THIS PROBLEM.  *AK
THERE ARE NO DEALERS TO REPAIR THE CAM SHAFT SENSORRECALL   04V357000.  *AK
